quest.name: The Hottest of Box Lunches
journal: Gegeroon of Memeroon's Trading Post has deliveries that need to be made.
Gegeroon of Memeroon's Trading Post has a delivery to make, but not enough time to do it himself. Help him out and deliver a hot box lunch to Tanga Tonga in his cabin at Thalaos.
Tanga Tonga is immensely pleased to receive his little bag full of toast and egg products. Fully sated, he can now focus on his research.
objectives: Deliver the hot box lunch to Tanga Tonga.

dialogue.name: GEGEROON
dialogue.text: Gegeroon has good goods. Good goods need delivery. But Gegeroon busy. Too, too busy.

dialogue.name: GEGEROON
dialogue.text: Have hot box lunch. Qiqirn hot box lunch. Lunch for Tanga Tonga. Tanga Tonga in Thalaos. You take for Gegeroon!

dialogue.name: TANGATOTUNGA
dialogue.text: Leave me be. I'm too hungry to continue my research, let alone receive visitors.

dialogue.name: TANGATOTUNGA
dialogue.text: This... This is a Qiqirn hot box lunch from Memeroon's Trading Post! H-How did you...? Thank you, friend! At last, I will be able to hear myself think over the growling of my stomach.

dialogue.name: TANGATOTUNGA
dialogue.text: I was so eager to come study the fossils, I never gave any thought to how I'd take my meals. I've neither the time nor the materials to cook on my own, so the trading post has been a godssend. I'm always happy to be on the receiving end of a nice, hot box lunch!
